content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler at position (-4.5, 24.0) 
- Offshore pump at position (-10.5, 25.5)

### Lab at position(5.5, -12.5)
Consists of the following entity:
- Lab at position (5.5, -12.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipes connecting various entities, including:
  - Pipe at position (-6.5, 24.5)
  - Pipe at position (-5.5, 22.5)
  - Pipe at position (-4.5, 22.5)
  - Pipe at position (-3.5, 22.5)
  - Pipe at position (-2.5, 22.5)
  - Additional pipes forming part of the fluid systems

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. For example, you need small electric poles to connect the lab and steam engine.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to power connections
- Make sure that all power-consuming entities (like the lab and steam engine) are connected to a power network. If they are not connected, they will not function properly.

### Errors with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Check the inventory and supply lines to ensure adequate resources are available.
